ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_2times | |- ( X e. CC -> ( 2 x. X ) = ( X + X ) ) |
| 2 | 1 | #P_oveq1d | |- ( X e. CC -> ( ( 2 x. X ) - X ) = ( ( X + X ) - X ) ) |
| 3 |  | #P_id | |- ( X e. CC -> X e. CC ) |
| 4 | 3, 3 | #P_pncan2d | |- ( X e. CC -> ( ( X + X ) - X ) = X ) |
| 5 | 2, 4 | #P_eqtrd | |- ( X e. CC -> ( ( 2 x. X ) - X ) = X ) |
